objective: Validate all research claims and technical assertions before implementation decisions
acceptance_criteria: All research claims must be fact-checked against primary sources
Technical assertions must be validated for accuracy and currency
Performance benchmarks must be verified against current data
Security claims must be confirmed with authoritative sources
Implementation recommendations must be validated for feasibility
Any factual inaccuracies must be corrected with evidence
Confidence scores must be adjusted based on verification results

context.business_domain: Personal knowledge management and research productivity
context.technical_scope: Local-first RAG chatbot with MoE enhancements and 2025 tech stack
key_requirements: Proposition-level document processing with citation accuracy
MoE architecture for intelligent retrieval routing
Production-grade security against RAG poisoning attacks
quality_gates: Zero tolerance for unverified technical claims
All performance benchmarks must be current (2024-2025)
Security research must be validated against primary sources
Implementation recommendations must be factually accurate
Confidence scores must reflect verification results
context.business_impact: Fact-checking ensures implementation decisions are based on verified information, reducing technical risk and improving project success probability
